diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Acute upper gastrointestinal bleeding from mucosal tears due to gastric overdistention following inadvertent esophageal intubation.
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Gastric perforation; other causes of upper gastrointestinal bleeding.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by the patient's history of inadvertent esophageal intubation, the presence of linear mucosal tears in the gastric fundus without surrounding inflammation, and the absence of significant trauma associated with either the nasogastric tube or the procedure.
